section.name: Unused files
section.p: Files which were imported from the "Hello World" template and are not used in MONTY:

Xchars.jsp is not used at the moment, but can be used to provide special characters.
There are two MessageRessource.properties files in the project path, but only src/main/resources/MessageResource.properties is used. The file under src/main/webapp/WEB-INF/MessageResources.properties is not used.
